Room.Name: Hafnia Circle
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Hafnia Circle, near the southwest corner of the city.
Room.LongDescription: On the east side of the road is a building with several guards at the door. The Elven War Council maintains a meeting place here, and hosts seminars on a monthly basis. They often invite representatives from other races to speak, and are very attentive to any proposals to get rid of the dragons that hold the lost city of Caledonia.
